title: PlayStation 5 Sales Numbers Have Arrived! -  Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.03.21
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about PS5 sales numbers, Embracer Group acquiring Gearbox, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
A new episode of Gamescast is live right now. It’s a full episode of what we’ve been playing. We talk about: Super Mario 3D World, Balan Wonderworld, Destruction AllStars, and more. That’s up over on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:07:40 - Finally! We have PlayStation 5 sales figures - Sam Byford @ The Verge
00:20:00 - Speaking of PlayStation sales: Spider-Man: Miles Morales sold 4.1 million units in 2020 - Sherif Saed @ VG247
00:24:09 - Borderlands developer Gearbox has been acquired by Embracer Group - Matthew Handrahan @ GiBiz
00:42:20 -  Ad
00:45:20 - EA 'Very, Very Confident' About Bioware's Future - Rebekah Valentine @ IGN
00:52:35 - Out today
00:54:15 - Squad Up:The "Other" Shaun(PSN) - TheOtherShaun
00:54:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
